participant_2.background:
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
i love to go shopping.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi.
I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.

content.text: I just got back from a long journey around the world. It was amazing!
Wow, that sounds like an incredible experience! What was your favorite part of the trip?
I loved seeing all the different cultures and meeting new people. I also loved exploring the great outdoors.
That sounds like so much fun! I've always wanted to go on a trip like that.
You should definitely do it! It's an experience you'll never forget.
I know, I know. I'll have to start planning one soon.
Well, I'm sure it will be amazing when you do.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go shopping, go to the movies, and play fetch with my dogs.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies!
Yeah, I try to keep busy.
That's good. I like to sing in the shower, and I'm a barista.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sing.
It's not that hard, you just have to practice.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
